r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n: ### Changed - Disable x-datadog-tags header propagation #1528 ### Fixed - Fix Laravel exceptions being over-reported #1361 - Fix too aggressive symbol exporting #1523 - Hide the dummy span during trace hooks away #1519 - (PHP 5) Remove empty multi_curl handles hashtables #1513 - Do not mess with the span duration in curl integration #1512 - Fix #1510 post-install not detecting required extension #1511 - ??Explicitly depend on ext/standard and fix in-tree builds #1509
